channel.title: Cult Buff ideas
channel.description:
Buff ideas for non-CL cultists:
># [color = "darkred"]**Ritualist**[/color] > [color = "darkred"]**Cult Support**[/color] > Passive: Will of Mithras - Sacrificing you will give the cult leader 3 uses of eraticate instead of 2 > >Day ability 1: Guidence - Target player will be occupy immune and bypass visit prevention tonight (1 use) > Day Ability 2: Exhume - Learn what class killed target dead player (1 use) > > Night ability 1: Teleport - Redirect all visitors between 2 target players. Bypasses redirection immunity. (3 uses) > Night ability 2: Brotherhood - Prevent anyone targeting target cultist. (2 uses)
># [color = "darkred"]**Seeker**[/color] > [color = "darkred"]**Cult Investigative**[/color] > > Day ability: Expose - You are told the next player to use a day ability besides King. (2 uses) > > Night ability 1: Identify - Learn the targets faction and class type (3 uses) > Night ability 2: Gaze - Learn who the target visits and who visits them (2 uses)
># [color = "darkred"]**Invoker**[/color] > [color = "darkred"]**Cult Offensive**[/color] > Passive: Fanatic - Occupy and Redirect immune > > Day ability 1: Bewilder - The next day ability target player uses will fail (1 use) > Day ability 2: Enrage - Your night ability's will bypass occupy immunity tonight (1 use) > > Night ability 1: Chains of Corax - Occupy target player (3 uses) > Night ability 2: Strings of Mithras - Redirect your first target to your second. (2 uses)
># [color = "darkred"]**Apostle**[/color] > [color = "darkred"]**Cult Social**[/color] > >Day Ability 1: Project - Send an anonymous message to all players. (2 use) >Day Ability 2: Mind control - Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. (2 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Mind Warp - Target player receives incorrect feedback tonight (3 uses) >Night Ability 2: Cult spy - Hear all whispers tomorrow (2 uses)
># [color = "darkred"]**Acolyte**[/color] > [color = "darkred"]**Cult Killer**[/color] > Passive: Blood shield - Immune to death once > > Day ability: Curse - Anyone who is bleeding cannot be healed tonight. (1 uses) > > Night ability 1: Judgement - If the Cult leader fails to convert his target then they will start bleeding. They will die in 1 night. (3 uses) > Night ability 2: Rampage - Eradicate will bypass night immunity tonight (2 uses)
Note: Judgement gives the same message as the hunter wolf. Shroud is just a defile that only works during the day.

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Planterror:

where’s the exhume?

Oops. Fixed

Planterror:

will it say success or will it say “your day ability failed” etc

“You were bewildered”

It doesn’t work on Scout and Jail btw because they don’t count as day abilities. Technically dirty work and sacrifice don’t either but there it doesn’t matter

Other than that I agree with changes.

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
It will work like the transporter in ToS.

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Expose (2 uses)

You are told the name of the next day ability used today.

Isn’t that useless though? It would only really be useful for trollboxes. And there’s nothing wrong with the suggested version.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
alright then , since i have i thought the cult was alright (might be my lack of eperience with them) ill just look at what is iffy.

NuclearBurrito:

Day ability: Shroud - If target player is executed today they will appear as a specified class. You will know what their real class was. (1 use)

Doesnt this give the Ritualist more offensive abilities than support abilities. Kek

NuclearBurrito:

Day ability: Expose - You are told the next player to use a day ability besides King. (2 uses)

How about:
Expose (2 uses)
You are told the name of the next day ability used today.

NuclearBurrito:

Day ability 1: Bewilder - The next day ability target player uses will fail (1 use)

More viable day occupation. Me like.

The rest is ok i guess

Read full topic

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

Then can you make it so it swaps the numbers of your targets instead?

What do you mean by this?

Read full topic

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

This is exactly the same as it is now exept with an additional use.

Then can you make it so it swaps the numbers of your targets instead?

NuclearBurrito:

And your replacement is useless because losing a CL or whatever isn’t any worse than loosing a Ritualist.

Here’s another replacement then:
Corax’s guidance(3 use) - Select a cult member and a cult class. Your target will become the new class at the end of the night.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

Does this bypass redirection immunity? If not then it’s a bit weak, and it should be changed so it swaps the numbers of your targets for the night instead.

This is exactly the same as it is now exept with an additional use.

RHCube:

This is a bit weak since only 2 BD classes(in cult games) have faction checks.

I would like to remind you that this is 2 out of a total of 3 BD invests. And your replacement is useless because losing a CL or whatever isn’t any worse than loosing a Ritualist.

Remember the alternative was to have it make a SINGLE cultist NS

RHCube:

Change this so it determines your target’s exact class.

I’m not sure that is needed. The ability is mostly to either find good convert targets or to build fake logs. If this buff happens and it is still too weak then that would be the next step however.

RHCube:

I’d still like it if this was replaced with snoop.

I designed it with the Social class rework ideas in mind where that isn’t needed. I only have so many slots and this would be the better Ability over Snoop in terms of usefulness.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Night ability 1: Teleport - Swap all visitors between 2 target players. (3 uses)

Does this bypass redirection immunity? If not then it’s a bit weak, and it should be changed so it swaps the numbers of your targets for the night instead.

NuclearBurrito:

Night ability 2: Brotherhood - The cult will appear Blue dragon to investigators tonight. (2 uses)

This is a bit weak since only 2 BD classes(in cult games) have faction checks. Here’s an idea to replace it:

Decoy(3 uses)(name isn’t final) - You will perform your target’s action for them tonight. You will receive any results they receive from their ability. Anything that happens to them will instead happen to you.

NuclearBurrito:

Night ability 1: Identify - Learn the targets faction and class type (3 uses)

Change this so it determines your target’s exact class.

NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 2: Hypnotize - Target player receive a feedback of your choice. (2 uses)

I’d still like it if this was replaced with snoop.

Read full topic
